mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.`name`, r.description, r.create_by_id createById, r.update_by_id updateById, r.create_time createTime, r.update_time updateTime, group_concat(f.func_id) funs FROM s_role r LEFT JOIN s_role_func f ON r.id = f.role_id WHERE r.id = #{id}
select distinct r.id,r.`name`,r.description from s_dep_role dr join s_role r on dr.role_id = r.id where dr.dep_id = #{depId}
